refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A Set is a collection of Books. Placing multiple Books in a Set, as opposed to publishing each of them separately, has the advantage that ID/IDREF links can then be used across all books.
Set is the very top of the DocBook structural hierarchy. There's nothing that contains a Set.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: A Set may generate additional front and back matter (tables of contents and SetIndexs, for example) around the Books it contains.
